stem: Каково максимальное recommended working pressure for acetylene?

choices.text: Do not use acetylene above 15 psi (≈103 kPa)
Any pressure is fine with arrestors

rationales.CHOICE-2: Acetylene is unstable above ~15 psi; keep working pressure below this.

stem: Что — the maximum recommended working pressure for ацетилен?

choices.text: Не использовать ацетилен выше 15 psi (≈103 кПа)

rationales.CHOICE-2: Ацетилен becomes unstable above ~15 psi; keep working pressure below this limit.

stem: Какова цель 'растрескивание' cylinder valves briefly before attaching regulators?

choices.text: To blow dust/debris away from the outlet seat

rationales.CHOICE-2: Растрескивание clears contaminants that could damage regulators.

stem: Какое утверждение о backfire vs flashback — верно?

choices.text: Backfire means flame travels into the hoses
Flashback — flame burning into the torch/hose; backfire — a momentary pop

rationales.CHOICE-2: Backfire — a brief pop at the наконечник; flashback sustains into the torch/hose and — hazardous.

stem: Какое утверждение about хлопка vs обратного удара пламени is correct?

choices.text: Backfire means flame travels into the hoses
Flashback is flame burning into the torch/hose; хлопка is a momentary pop

rationales.CHOICE-2: Backfire is a brief pop; обратного удара пламени sustains into torch/hose and is hazardous.

stem: Какое утверждение о кислородно-топливного hose/torch threads — верно?

choices.text: Fuel gas fittings use right-hand threads
Fuel gas fittings use left-hand threads with notches

rationales.CHOICE-2: Fuel gas fittings — left-hand (often with notches); кислород — right-hand to предотвращает mixups.

stem: Какое утверждение about кислородно‑топливной fittings is true?

choices.text: Fuel gas fittings use right-hand threads
Fuel gas fittings use left-hand threads (often notched); oxygen is right-hand

rationales.CHOICE-2: Left-hand threads help prevent misconnections with fuel gas lines.

stem: Какое описание соответствует a neutral кислородно-топливного flame?

choices.text: A balanced inner cone with no feather
An oxidizing feather on the inner cone
A loud, popping flame with backfire

rationales.CHOICE-2: Neutral flame has a well-defined cone and no ацетилен feather.

stem: Какое описание matches a neutral кислородно‑топливной flame?

choices.text: A balanced inner cone with no feather
An oxidizing feather on the inner cone

rationales.CHOICE-2: Neutral flame has a well-defined inner cone without an acetylene feather.

stem: Что is the correct practice regarding oxygen equipment?

choices.text: Никогда use oil/grease on oxygen equipment
Do not crack cylinder valves before attaching regulators

rationales.CHOICE-2: Oil/grease can ignite violently in oxygen systems.

stem: Что — the верно practice regarding кислород equipment?

choices.text: Никогда не использовать масло/смазку на кислородном оборудовании
not трещина cylinder valves before attaching regulators

rationales.CHOICE-2: Oil/grease can ignite violently in pure кислород.

stem: Какой верный приём для piercing a plate with кислородно-топливного?

choices.text: Place the наконечник flat and go to full кислород immediately
Tilt the наконечник, предварительного подогрева, then use the кислород jet to pierce
Point straight down without предварительного подогрева

rationales.CHOICE-2: Preheating and a slight tilt help предотвращает blowback and наконечник damage.

stem: For piercing a plate with кислородно‑топливной, a good technique is to:

choices.text: Place the сопла flat and go to full oxygen immediately
Tilt the сопла, подогрева, then use the oxygen jet to pierce

rationales.CHOICE-2: Preheat and a slight tilt help prevent blowback and сопла damage.

stem: Insufficient подогрева during cutting often causes:

rationales.CHOICE-2: Too little подогрева leads to slagging and poor starts.

stem: Почему clean кислородно‑топливной cutting соплаs with correct сопла cleaners?

choices.text: To enlarge the orifices for more flow
To maintain proper orifice size/shape and cut quality

rationales.CHOICE-2: Proper cleaners keep orifices correct, preserving flame shape and quality.

stem: If travel speed is too fast in кислородно‑топливной cutting, the cut will:

choices.text: Lag and drag lines will trail far behind the сопла

rationales.CHOICE-2: Excessive speed увеличиваетs линиий отставания (lag lines); too slow causes heavy slag.

choices.text: Blow dust/debris away from the outlet seat

rationales.CHOICE-2: Cracking clears contaminants that could damage regulators.
